title: All about the punch machine
content: Congratulations on the purchase of your punch machine!We offer a series of articles to discover how it works.Type of employee access to the punch: Physical punch or mobile punchPunch access code for employees to punch on the ticket machine or punch machineDescription of the options for the interface of the employee account with the punch - Model V1Description of the options for the interface of the employee account with the punch - Model V2Setting the functions of your punching machine for your employeesDisplay of messages for employees on the punchAnd for those who have opted for the virtual punch machine:Virtual punch: configuration and troubleshootingVirtual punch V2 camera not workingHelpful?00Updated: 4 years ago Share :
